visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1101 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1101 RETURN  n.Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1110 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1110 RETURN  n.Date  as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1106 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1106 RETURN  n.Developer as Developer, n.CountOfIssueForDeveloper as Issues

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1107 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1107 RETURN  n.Type as Type, sum(n.Count) as Count

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1102 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1102 RETURN  n.resultField as Deployment ,n.Deployment as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1103 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1103 RETURN n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1104 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1104 RETURN  n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1108 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1108 RETURN  n.resultField as Time , n.Time as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1111 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1111 RETURN  n.resultField as Builds, n.Builds as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1112 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1112 RETURN  n.resultField as Time, n.Time as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1113 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1113 RETURN  n.resultField as Defects,n.Defects as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 1100 and n.kpiId=1114 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=1114 RETURN  n.resultField as Stories,n.Stories as Value
